institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 19 (Support for Study Group Activities)
contents: Article 19 (Support for learning group activities) ① The chairman may form a learning group and support activity expenses to establish a learning culture in the supporting company. ② The learning group must self-select job-related learning topics and conduct learning activities among members at least twice a month, and can support the contents of each item., 1. Learning group operating expenses, 2. Learning facilitator and leader allowance, 3. Education expenses.
